LanguageData.Settings.UseHpAndQualityInLoadouts.Label: HP and Quality for loadouts
LanguageData.Settings.UseHpAndQualityInLoadouts.Desc: Adds HP and Quality ranges to loadouts\n\nNeed reload game
LanguageData.Settings.UseMultiLoadouts.Label: More loadout columns
LanguageData.Settings.UseMultiLoadouts.Desc: Adds new columns for loadouts on the 'Assign' tab. Now the colonists can be assigned different sets for tools, weapons, and rations.\n\nNeed reload game
LanguageData.Settings.MultiLoadoutsCount.Label: The number of loadout columns
LanguageData.Settings.MultiLoadoutsCount.Desc: How many columns to add\n\nNeed reload game
LanguageData.Settings.OptimizeApparel.Desc: Forcibly update the colonists clothes (Don't forget to turn it off. Possible load on TPS)
LanguageData.Settings.LoadoutName.Desc: The name you want to call your loadout
